languages.text: {n}Мужчина оттягивает угол рта в едкой усмешке.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}... Ваша Светлость, при всем почтении, право на колдовские силы дано мне силой, превосходящей вашу. Позвольте представиться: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции Императора, аколит высочайшего Лорд-инквизитора и его же милостью санкционированный {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкер{/g} на службе Империума. Если мы покончили с представлениями, позвольте со всем почтением поинтересоваться — какие же обстоятельства привели Вольного Торговца в стены этого монастыря, подвергшегося нашествию еретиков?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина оттягивает угол рта в едкой усмешке.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}... Ваша светлость, при всем почтении, право на псайкану дано мне силой, превосходящей вашу. Позвольте представиться: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель священного Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции Императора, член свиты высочайшего Лорда-инквизитора и его же милостью санкционированный {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкер{/g} на службе Империума. Если мы покончили с представлениями, позвольте со всем почтением поинтересоваться — какие же обстоятельства привели Вольного Торговца в стены этого монастыря, подвергшегося нашествию еретиков?"

languages.text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to sorcerous powers was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by His Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to enquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина оттягивает угол рта в едкой усмешке.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}... Ваша Светлость, при всем почтении, право на колдовские силы дано мне силой, превосходящей вашу. Позвольте представиться: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции Императора, аколит высочайшего Лорд-инквизитора и его же милостью санкционированный {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкер{/g} на службе Империума. Если мы покончили с представлениями, позвольте со всем почтением поинтересоваться — какие же обстоятельства привели Вольного Торговца в стены этого монастыря, подвергшегося нашествию еретиков?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A Rogue Trader... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to psykana was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself. Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's retinue and, by the said Lord's grace, a sanctioned psyker in the Imperium's service. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to inquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, even as it is overrun by heretics?"

{n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A Rogue Trader... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to psykana was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to inquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, even as it is overrun by heretics?"

Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's retinue and, by his Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by his Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to inquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"

languages.text: {n}男人嘴角露出了刻薄的微笑。{/n}“一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}……恕我直言，大人，我拥有巫术的力量，而我的力量是由比你更强大的存在所赋予的。请允许我自我介绍一下，我是帝国审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，大审判官大人的侍仆，来自神圣的异形审判庭。在大审判官大人的恩典之下，我成为了帝国获得授权的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}。不知我介绍得是否足够充分？那么，请允许我恭敬地问个问题：是什么风，把一位行商浪人吹到了这座被异端分子占据的修道院呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to sorcerous powers was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by His Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to enquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"

traits.locale_text: {n}男人的嘴角露出了刻薄的微笑。{/n}“一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}……恕我直言，大人，我拥有巫术的力量，而我的力量是由比你更强大的存在所赋予的。请允许我自我介绍一下，我是帝国审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，审判长大人的随从，来自神圣的异形审判庭。在审判长大人的恩典之下，我成为了帝国获得授权的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}。不知我介绍得是否足够充分？那么，请允许我恭敬地问个问题：是什么风，把一位行商浪人吹到了这座被异端分子占据的修道院呢？”

{n}男人嘴角露出了刻薄的微笑。{/n}“一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}……恕我直言，大人，我拥有巫术的力量，而我的力量是由比你更强大的存在所赋予的。请允许我自我介绍一下，我是帝国审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，大审判官大人的侍仆，来自神圣的异形审判庭。在大审判官大人的恩典之下，我成为了帝国获得授权的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}。不知我介绍得是否足够充分？那么，请允许我恭敬地问个问题：是什么风，把一位行商浪人吹到了这座被异端分子占据的修道院呢？”

languages.text: {n}男は口角を釣り上げて笑みを作る。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}ですか…失礼ですが、{mf|陛下|陛下}、我の魔術師としての力は、大いなる力によって授けられたものなのでございます。自己紹介をさせていただきたい。我は帝国の異端審問庁、栄誉ある『純血の団』のインテロゲイター、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス。ロード・インクィジターの従者にして、その恩寵によりて帝国に仕える公認{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}です。これで自己紹介は済みましたでしょうか。お尋ねさせてください、異端者が跋扈するこの修道院に、どのような経緯で自由開拓者がやってくることになったのかを」
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to sorcerous powers was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by His Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to enquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"

traits.locale_text: {n}男は口角を釣り上げて笑みを作る。{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}か…失礼ですが、{mf|陛下|陛下}、私の魔術師としての力は、より大いなる力によって授けられたものなのですよ。自己紹介をさせていただきたい。私は帝国の異端審問庁、神聖なる〈純血の団〉のハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックス。ロード・インクィジターの従者にして、その恩寵によりて帝国に仕える認定{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}です。これで自己紹介は済んだでしょうか。お尋ねしたい、異端者が跋扈するこの修道院に、どのような経緯でローグトレーダーがやってくることになったのかを。

languages.text: {n}Der Mann verzieht seine Mundwinkel zu einem verbitterten Lächeln .{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin}{/g} ... Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, mein Anrecht auf magische Kräfte erhielt ich von einer höheren Macht als der Euren. Gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen – Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der geschätzten Ordo Xenos der imperialen Inquisition, Mitglied der Gefolgschaft des Großinquisitors und dank der Gunst Seiner Lordschaft sanktionierter {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} in Diensten des Imperiums. Falls Euch das als Vorstellung genügt, gestattet mir die respektvolle Frage, welche Umstände {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} in dieses von Ketzern überrannte Kloster geführt haben."
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to sorcerous powers was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by His Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to enquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann verzieht seine Mundwinkel zu einem verbitterten Lächeln .{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin}{/g} ... Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, mein Anrecht auf magische Kräfte erhielt ich von einer höheren Macht als der Euren. Gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen – Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der geschätzten Ordo Xenos der imperialen Inquisition, Mitglied der Gefolgschaft des Großinquisitors und dank der Gunst Seiner Lordschaft sanktionierter {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} in Diensten des Imperiums. Falls Euch das als Vorstellung genügt, gestattet mir die respektvolle Frage, welche Umstände {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} in dieses von Ketzern überrannte Kloster geführt haben."

{n}Der Mann lächelt angesäuert, aber nur mit den Mundwinkeln.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin}{/g} ... Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, mein Anrecht auf magische Kräfte erhielt ich von einer höheren Macht als der Euren. Gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen – Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der geschätzten Ordo Xenos der imperialen Inquisition, Mitglied der Gefolgschaft des Großinquisitors und dank der Gunst seiner Lordschaft sanktionierter {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} in Diensten des Imperiums. Falls Euch das als Vorstellung genügt, gestattet mir die respektvolle Frage, welche Umstände {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} in dieses aktuell von Ketzern überrannte Kloster geführt haben."

languages.text: {n}L'homme vous répond avec un sourire acerbe :{/n} « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande}{/g}... Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, Votre Seigneurie, mon droit à la sorcellerie m'a été accordé par un pouvoir supérieur au vôtre. Permettez-moi de me présenter, interrogateur Heinrix van Calox, du vénérable Ordo Xénos de l'Inquisition Impériale, membre de l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur et, par la grâce de Sa Seigneurie, {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} assermenté au service de l'Imperium. Après cette introduction qui, je l'espère, sera suffisante, pourrais-je vous demander quelles sont les raisons qui amènent {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} dans ce monastère, infesté d'hérétiques qui plus est ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to sorcerous powers was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by His Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to enquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme vous répond avec un sourire acerbe :{/n} « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande}{/g}... Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, Votre Seigneurie, mon droit à la sorcellerie m'a été accordé par un pouvoir supérieur au vôtre. Permettez-moi de me présenter, interrogateur Heinrix van Calox, du vénérable Ordo Xénos de l'Inquisition Impériale, membre de l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur et, par la grâce de Sa Seigneurie, {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} assermenté au service de l'Imperium. Après cette introduction qui, je l'espère, sera suffisante, pourrais-je vous demander quelles sont les raisons qui amènent {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} dans ce monastère, infesté d'hérétiques qui plus est ? »

languages.text: {n}El hombre eleva la comisura de sus labios en una sonrisa áspera.{/n} «Un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}... Con todo el debido respeto, mi{mf|lord|lady}, me concedió el derecho a los poderes de la hechicería una autoridad aún más poderosa que la suya. Permita que me presente: Interrogador Heinrix van Calox del Ordo Xenos de la Inquisición Imperial, miembro de la comitiva del Lord Inquisidor y, por gracia de su señoría, {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} autorizado al servicio del Imperium. Si con esta información basta para presentarme, permítame que pregunte respetuosamente qué circunstancias han traído a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente a este monasterio, actualmente controlado por los herejes».
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to sorcerous powers was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by His Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to enquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre eleva la comisura de sus labios en una sonrisa áspera.{/n} «Un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}... Con todo el debido respeto, mi{mf|lord|lady}, me concedió el derecho a los poderes de la hechicería una autoridad aún más poderosa que la suya. Permita que me presente: Interrogador Heinrix van Calox del Ordo Xenos de la Inquisición Imperial, miembro de la comitiva del Lord Inquisidor y, por gracia de su señoría, {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} autorizado al servicio del Imperium. Si con esta información basta para presentarme, permítame que pregunte respetuosamente qué circunstancias han traído a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente a este monasterio, actualmente controlado por los herejes».

languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A Rogue Trader... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to sorcerous powers was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by his Lordship's grace, sanctioned psyker in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to inquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"

languages.text: {n}Adamın ağzının kenarında alaycı bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} demek... Saygısızlık etmek istemem ama sahir güçlerine sahip olma hakkım, bana sizden daha büyük bir otorite tarafından bahşedildi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kendimi tanıtayım: Bendeniz, İmparatorluk Engizisyonu'nun saygın Zeno Nizamı'ndan Sorgucu Heinrix van Calox. Yüce Lord Engizisyoncu'nun eşrafındanım ve Lord Hazretleri'nin lütfuyla İmparatorluk hizmetinde onaylı {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezerlik{/g} yapıyorum. Tanışma faslı için bu kadarı kâfiyse affınıza sığınarak bir şey soracağım. Kâfir istilası altındaki bu manastıra sizi hangi rüzgâr attı?"
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles acerbically out of the corner of his mouth.{/n} "A {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... With all due respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my right to sorcerous powers was bestowed upon me by a greater power than yours. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos, member of the High Lord Inquisitor's circle and, by His Lordship's grace, sanctioned {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} in the service of the Imperium. If this suffices as introduction, permit me respectfully to enquire, what manner of circumstance has brought a Rogue Trader to this monastery, currently overrun by heretics?"

Saygısızlık etmek istemem ama sahir güçlerine sahip olma hakkım, bana sizden daha büyük bir otorite tarafından bahşedildi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kendimi tanıtayım: Bendeniz, İmparatorluk Engizisyonu'nun saygın Zeno Nizamı'ndan Sorgucu Heinrix van Calox. Yüce Lord Engizisyoncu'nun eşrafındanım ve Lord Hazretlerinin lütfuyla İmparatorluk hizmetinde onaylı {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}lik yapıyorum. Tanışma faslı için bu kadarı kâfiyse affınıza sığınarak bir şey soracağım. Kâfir istilası altındaki bu manastıra sizi hangi rüzgâr attı?"
